moves.1... d5: which then he replied with D5
moves.2. cxd5: I thought I might as well take it
moves.3. Nc3: I brought my Knight to attack the Queen and at this point I thought he would move back to D8
moves.3... Qf5: but instead moved it to F5 and thought whilst its out I can attack it
moves.4. e4: Started with E4 protected with the Knight
moves.4... Qf6: He then moved to F6 with the queen
moves.5. Qa4+: I then decided to bring mine out and put him in check
moves.5... Qc6: which he moved his Queen again and I thought he would of done Nc6 or Bd7 to develop his pieces
moves.6. Bb5: I then pinned his queen with the Bishop
moves.6... Na6: He then brought his Knight out which I thought he would of either done Qd7 or Bd7
moves.7. Bxc6+: which I naturally took the queen hoping he would take my Bishop so then I could do Qc6 so then I could after do Qa8
moves.7... Kd8: Instead he moved his king to D8
moves.8. Qd4+: which I then went to D4 with the queen Knowing he only had Bd7
moves.8... Bd7: He then made the move he could only do
